title: Miasma Bottle
desc:
Post 110
- Deal 1 damage to all players, including yourself.
- **Have a Nice Death**
 - Gain a random **Have a Nice Death** item upon use UNLESS below condition applies AND you got this item from this attribute.
 - A random opponent gains a <:corrupted_charge:1240975576324509787> if you've already used 2+ **Have a Nice Death** items this game.
_ _
